name: Laura Green
text: Playing Along — Action: Search your deck for a [[treachery]] card, shuffle your deck and place that card on the top of your deck. (Limit once per round.) "Out of all the planets in the universe… How is it I keep winding up on this one?"

name: Lyja
text: Skrull Spy — Action: Spend up to 1[per_hero] resources of any type → search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card for each resource spent this way, shuffle the encounter deck, and place those cards on the top of the encounter deck in any order.

name: Human Torch
text: Response: After Human Torch leaves play, search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card, shuffle the encounter deck, and place that card on the top of the encounter deck. “Man, this has to be my third-worst breakup ever!”

name: Faking Death
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: Choose to either stun or confuse an enemy. [star] Boost: The activating enemy gets -2 SCH and -2 ATK for this activation.

name: Feign Loyalty
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: Discard an attachment with the uses keyword or the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response" from play. [star] Boost: Draw 2 cards.

name: Hero Appearance
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: The Lyja player deals 4 damage among enemies in play. [star] Boost: The Lyja player deals 3 damage to an enemy.

name: Posing as a Civilian
text: Hero Action: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck. When Revealed: The Lyja player removes 3 threat from among schemes in play. [star] Boost: The Lyja player removes 2 threat from a scheme.

name: New York Bookstore
text: Laura Green gets +2 REC. Alter-Ego Response: After you make a basic recovery, draw 1 card. “Try thinking about your life instead of your image!" —Lyja

name: Lazerfist
text: Lyja gets +1 ATK. Hero Resource: Exhaust Lazerfist → generate a [energy] resource. "Remember how I lost my ability to fire energy blasts? Well, I got it back…" —Lyja

name: Ministerial Tiara
text: Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, if that card has a star icon ([star]) in the boost area, exhaust this card → draw 1 card. "﻿They restored power to my hands… Insulated me against heat and fire… And gave me my old ministerial post back." —Lyja

name: Mole
text: Hero Interrupt: When a [[treachery]] card is discarded from the top of the encounter deck, exhaust Mole → resolve that card's "When Revealed" ability. "I am Skrull in body… and human in soul!" —Lyja

name: Shapeshifter
text: Lyja gets +1 THW. Hero Response: After you play a [[treachery]] event, exhaust Shapeshifter → ready Lyja. "No mere flame cage can hold me! I am now Lyja… The Lazerfist!!" —Lyja

name: The Thing
text: Toughness. Action: Discard a tough status card from The Thing and choose up to 2 enemies → deal 2 damage to each of them. “It's clobberin' time!"

name: Going Ballistic
text: Hero Action (attack): Discard your hand. Deal 2 damage to an enemy (to a maximum of 6) for each card discarded this way. “This is how I want you, unfaithful wretch, on your knees!” —Lyja

name: Hit the Weak Spot
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to a minion for each icon ([star] and [boost]) in that minion's boost area. This attack gains piercing. “Thank me later! Go!” —Lyja

name: Invisible Woman
text: Invisible Woman takes +1 consequential damage for each revelation counter on the target of her basic power. Forced Response: After Invisible Woman uses a basic power, place 1 revelation counter on the target of that power.

name: Mister Fantastic
text: Resource: Exhaust Mister Fantastic and deal 1 damage to him → generate a [mental] resource. “Nothing is ever what it appears... it's the mysteries and the unknown that make life interesting."

name: Laser Tag
text: Team-Up (Human Torch and Lyja). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Ready Human Torch, Lyja, and each [[superpower]] upgrade you control.

name: Baxter Building
text: Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 if you control a [[fantastic four]] character. Resource: Exhaust Baxter Building → generate a [wild] resource for any player. The Baxter Building is located in Manhattan. It has been home to the Fantastic Four.

name: Fantasti-Car
text: Response: After Fantasti-Car enters play, ready a [[fantastic four]] card. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Fantasti- Car → choose a player. That player may shuffle 1 card from their discard pile into their deck.

name: Fantastic Four Member
text:
Play only if your identity has the [[fantastic four]] trait. 
Attach to a friendly character. Max 1 per character.
Attached character gets +1 hit point and gains the [[fantastic four ]]trait.
